body:
Hello,
Is there a way to distribute pre-built binaries via SPACK? 
I realize that building from sources is the main workflow for spack packages, but there are several places in documentation mentioning binary packages, binary caches and binary mirrors, so I guess it possible. However, I cannot find more information on that. 'spack create' help has no options regarding composing package from just binaries without using source code. 
Could you give me a hint where to find some information/instructions if it is possible in general.
Thanks.
title: Distribution of binaries via SPACK
